generated_description: safe space ingenuity, legally known as safe space ingenuity inc., is a company based in the village of lynbrook, new york, specializing in floor safety solutions. the company provides slip resistance testing services and traction enhancing treatments for all types of hard-surfaced flooring. their services include in-field slip resistance testing according to the american national standard (ansi) a326.3, using the bot-3000e tribometer, and the boostâ„¢ assurance program, which offers traction-enhancing treatments formulated to increase the coefficient of friction of flooring materials. safe space ingenuity aims to reduce hazards and liabilities associated with slip and fall incidents by ensuring floors meet safety standards and implementing effective floor safety management programs.

long_description: safe space ingenuity, inc. (ssi) believes in a comprehensive approach to the prevention and remediation of slip and fall hazards. our team of safety professionals have over 9 years of experience, and have earned a reputation as one of the most qualified, reliable floor safety consulting firms. safe space ingenuity, inc. takes a very organic approach to helping our clients reduce their exposure to slip and fall hazards. our unique process defines the environment, the history, and the objective, as integral parts of a slip and fall prevention program. ssi is dedicated to educating our clients about newly released industry standards and to helping enforce those standards in order to reduce the potential for a slip and fall. our goal is to be your total floor safety solution provider. ssi enhances floor safety through slip resistance testing, maintenance and traction enhancing treatments. our services can be tailored to any industry segment, any property configuration, and every area accessible to the walking public. the demand for comprehensive solutions to the slip and fall epidemic is great and growing at alarming rates. no other walkway safety company can compare to the value we create for our clients.
